title: Clipping in Page View of MS Word
content:
Just received an enquiry about one of my fonts not behaving in Word. It looks like line tops are clipped in the Page View, it looks OK in Normal View, and it prints fine. What is more, my font is not the only one, huh :|

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203101805im_/http:/typophile.com/files/clipping_4923.png)
  
Most other fonts (TNR, Helvetica, etc.) do not share this problem.  
What is going on, please?
author: paragraph

comments.content: BUMP: Should I just forget about it?

I guess everyone is at [**Typecon2009**](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203101805/http:/www.typecon.com/). Did you have a look at the typophile link [ascenders cut off in Microsoft Word](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203101805/http:/www.typophile.com/cms/node/45635) or the Typowiki [Vertical Metrics How To](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203101805/http:/typophile.com/node/13081) ?

Thanks very much, Michel.  
I should have expected this to be messy, as Georgia has the same problem (cough)
